message: Starting Phase 2 review - checking handover and agent deliverables
Reviewing previous findings. Need to verify actual file state for agents.py and phases.py migration.
Read agents.py and phases.py. Now checking state_db for get_agents_for_task SQL issue.
Read state_db.py. Analyzing migration completeness and SQL issues.
Analyzing migration pattern: SQLite-first with JSON fallback. Checking if this meets success criteria.

Review complete. Verdict: APPROVED. Verified agents.py and phases.py use SQLite-first pattern with JSON fallback. state_db functions implement correct SQL queries. Previous reviewers' claim of created_at SQL error is incorrect - current code uses started_at correctly.
